attributes.action: Make it legal for anyone to just write 'its private' across their tax return.
attributes.additional_details: Until full disclosure is made regarding these allegations, the law should be changed to allow everybody the same rights and privacy when it comes to their tax returns.
attributes.background: Recent revelations made when the 'Panama Papers' were released indicate that David Cameron's father had some of his wealth hidden in offshore accounts from HMRC for tax avoidance purposes. When enquiries were made his answer was 'its private'.

rejection.details: Every citizen has the same rights of privacy in relation to their tax return, so we're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
